hooks.command: echo "$(date): Claude Stop hook triggered in $PWD" >> /tmp/claude-hooks.log && [ "$CLAUDE_STOP_HOOK_ACTIVE" != "true" ] && curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:7878/notification -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"type": "claude-finished", "worktree": "'$PWD'", "message": "Task completed"}' --silent --fail || true
